<S%H7662>"Leave<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H5673>work<s%> on the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H7662>alone;<s%> let the <S%H6347>governor<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> and the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> <S%H1124>rebuild<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> on its <S%H870>site.<s%>

that they may <S%H7127>offer<s%> <S%H5208>acceptable<s%> <S%H5208>sacrifices<s%> to the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> and <S%H6739>pray<s%> for the <S%H2417>life<s%> of the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H1123>sons.<s%>

"And may the <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>who<s%> has caused His <S%H8036>name<s%> to <S%H7932>dwell<s%> <S%H8536>there<s%> <S%H4049>overthrow<s%> <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> or <S%H5972>people<s%> <S%H1768>who<s%> <S%H7972>attempts<s%> <S%H3028><s%> to <S%H8133>change<s%> [it,] so as to <S%H2255>destroy<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> in <S%H3390>Jerusalem.<s%> I, <S%H1868>Darius,<s%> have <S%H7761>issued<s%> [this] <S%H2942>decree,<s%> let [it] be <S%H5648>carried<s%> out with <S%H629>all<s%> <S%H629>diligence!<s%>"

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H8674>Tattenai,<s%> the <S%H6347>governor<s%> of [the province] <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> Shethar-bozenai, and their <S%H3675>colleagues<s%> <S%H5648>carried<s%> out [the decree] with <S%H629>all<s%> <S%H629>diligence,<s%> <S%H6903>just<s%> as <S%H4430>King<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> had <S%H7972>sent.<s%>

For the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> had <S%H2891>purified<s%> themselves <S%H259>together;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them were <S%H2889>pure.<s%> Then they <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> [lamb] for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>exiles,<s%> <S%H1473><s%> both for their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for themselves.
